attributes.action: find the time to call the parents of the murdered french students rather than Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell about a singers feelings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am amazed that with the country going to hell in a hand cart, the PM finds time to ask about a singers health, while the parents of murdered french students are ignored. Obviously there is no mileage in this story for him.

rejection.details: Your petition must make a point about government policy. Please rephrase your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
